resources.string: Share shot allows you to share photos with connected users via Wi-Fi Direct. Wi-Fi Direct connection required.
You can touch and hold shortcuts to edit.
Touch and hold icon, then drag it to edit position of shortcuts
Touch and hold the camera button to take a burst shot
Tap the camera button first, and then move the device slowly in one direction.
To select the shortcuts you want to use, touch and hold an icon and drag it to where you want to put it.
Shortcuts will be reset to default settings.
